Title: Cross My Heart and Hope to Die
Writer: Lars Saabye Christensen (novel), Lars Saabye Christensen (screenplay), Marius Holst
Actors: Martin Dahl Garfalk, Trond Halbo, Jan Devo Kornstad, Ingar Helge Gimle
Plot: The young teenager Otto is entering the summer holidays in 60s Oslo, without getting a real holiday, and he is not accepted in the gang or the football team. But then he meets exciting mysterious Frank, which changes everything.
